function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through wildlife and the environment","Impact":"Infection of humans and other animals with contagious diseases, leading to potential outbreaks and health crises","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to monitor and control wildlife and environmental interactions to minimize disease transmission","Technologies":"Remote sensing, GPS tracking, disease surveillance systems","People":"Local communities, conservation workers, researchers","Owner":"Conservation organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Risk of zoonotic disease spillover due to perturbations in wildlife and ecology","Impact":"Spread of zoonotic diseases from wildlife to humans due to ecosystem disruption, leading to public health risks","Mitigation":"Strengthening surveillance and early detection of zoonotic diseases, promoting wildlife habitat conservation","Technologies":"Environmental DNA analysis, disease surveillance technologies","People":"Local communities, conservation workers, public health authorities","Owner":"Conservation organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Potential impact of conservation activities perturbation on disease vectors and transmission","Impact":"Increase in disease transmission due to changes in habitat and vector populations, leading to higher disease burden","Mitigation":"Integrating disease surveillance and vector control into conservation activities, promoting habitat restoration and management","Technologies":"GIS mapping, vector control technologies, disease modeling","People":"Communities living near conservation areas, conservation workers, public health authorities","Owner":"Conservation organizations, public health agencies"}]}
